about: Full Stack Developer using C#/ASP.Net Core and React

Engaged in the development of modern, scalable, and high-performance web applications. On the backend, I build robust RESTful APIs with C# and .NET Core, integrating databases, authentication, and business logic. On the frontend, I use React to create interactive, responsive interfaces with a focus on user experience. I am familiar with DevOps practices, version control with Git, API consumption, continuous integration, and automated testing. Committed to clean code practices, design patterns, and agile methodologies.

Technology enthusiast, Linux and open source. I have experience with a wide range of tools and platforms, including: Ubuntu, CentOS, Docker (Swarm and Compose), WSL2, Microsoft Active Directory/LDAP, Windows Server, NGINX, virtualization with Hyper-V, Proxmox, VirtualBox, VMWare, and Linux KVM, Oracle Cloud, Oracle Database, PostgreSQL, and Redis.

In search of challenging projects. Focused on results through the improvement and automation of processes and systems. I am always eager to study new things. Given the constant changes in the computing field, I can't always delve deeply into certain subjects, but I try to at least grasp the concepts to understand which technologies can solve my problems.
